Description.Text:
Position Only 50 mt. from the beach of the famous Riviera of Versilia in Tuscany, Villa Undulna and the Terme della Versilia are in Cinquale di Montignoso, only 3 km from Forte dei Marmi, 150 mt. from the turistic airport and 200 mt. from the touristic port.
Restaurant The restaurant "Terme della Versilia" will delight you with its menu rich in Italian delicatessen, its international dishes, and dishes of the famous regional cuisine, which are presented with care and elegance and washed down with the excellent selection of wines of its own cellar.
More Informations Rates include: the use of the swimming pool with warm thermal water (one pool for swimming at the temperature of 29° and a small pool for relax at the temperature of 34°; the cap is obligatory), fitness centre, tennis and mini soccer grounds, bikes; outdoor parking inside the structure protected by automatic gates, bicycles, subject to availability, free Wi-Fi in the lobby.
